name: Text Classifier
semantic_context: Classify your text into distinct categories
natural_language_description: 这是 Text Classifier 节点。主要用于: Classify your text into distinct categories

inputText.name: inputText
inputText.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text
inputText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text to Classify | 作用: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text | (必填项)

categories.name: categories
categories.natural_language_description: 参数名: Categories | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fallback (值: None) - What to do with items that don’t match the categories exactly
systemPromptTemplate (值: None) - String to use directly as the system prompt template
enableAutoFixing (值: None) - Whether to enable auto-fixing (may trigger an additional LLM call if output is broken)
batching (值: None) - Batch processing options for rate limiting
